FuncDef:
The storm control action command sets the storm control action to error-down or block.
The undo storm control action command cancels the configuration. The storm control action command sets the storm control action to error-down or block. The undo storm control action command cancels the configuration. By default, no storm control action is configured.
CLIs: storm control action { error-down | block | suppress }
